verbs.description: Last week , after months of [V: growing] [ARG1: censorship] , Rob Rogers , the 25-year editorial cartoonist for the Pittsburgh Post - Gazette , was fired . Speculation was that his brand of political criticism was n’t falling into line with the ownership ’s right - wing Trump ...
